'''''"Wanna Learn? I'll Teach You!"''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to defeat the {{Enemy|Stonehide Lawachurl}} in the Guhua training location three times.

==Gameplay Notes==
* The Stonehide Lawachurl appears only after completing the quest [[Shrouded Vale, Hidden Hero]]
* The Stonehide Lawachurl appears after returning to the area upon teleporting away.
* After the second defeat, the Stonehide Lawachurl will gain a {{Geo|Rumbling Stone}} [[aura]].
* The Stonehide Lawachurl will appear at the following location in [[Chenyu Vale: Upper Vale]]:
*: <gallery>
Achievement Wanna Learn? I'll Teach You! Location.png|Stonehide Lawachurl's location
Achievement Wanna Learn? I'll Teach You! Location Context.png|Additional context
</gallery>

==Trivia==
* The Stonehide Lawachurl presents one of the following titles depending on the number of times the player has defeated it:
** No defeats: Inexperienced, Uninitiated Guhua Disciple
** One defeat: Vaguely Accomplished Uninitiated Guhua Disciple
** Two defeats or more: Uninitiated Guhua Disciple, Honed and Refined
* The achievement's name is a quote from {{W|Kung Fu Hustle}}, a 2004 action comedy movie directed, produced and co-written by Stephen Chow, who also stars in the lead role Sing. After losing to Sing's Buddha Palm Strike, the antagonist Beast asked "What kind of move was that?" to which Sing responded "Wanna Learn? I'll teach you."
